title: Intro to C Programming
description: Learn the basic of C programming. This course covers essential concepts and programming exercises to help you become proficient in C.

title: Intro to Algorithms
description: Master algorithm design and analysis techniques. This course provides in-depth knowledge of various algorithms and their applications.

title: C++ for DSA
description: Use C++ to implement data structures and algorithms. This course combines C++ programming with data structure and algorithm theory.

title: Basic Data Structures
description: Explore foundational data structures like arrays and linked lists. This course lays the groundwork for understanding more complex data structures.

title: Intro to OOP Python
description: Get started with Object-Oriented Programming in Python. This course introduces you to OOP concepts and Python's implementation of them.

title: Software Engineering
description: Learn software development processes and methodologies. This comprehensive course covers the entire software engineering lifecycle.

title: AWS and Cloud Computing
description: Explore cloud computing with Amazon Web Services. This course provides hands-on experience with AWS services and cloud architecture.

title: Database (MySQL)
description: Master MySQL database management and querying. This course covers SQL fundamentals and advanced database topics.

title: Problem Solving
description: Enhance your problem-solving skills and critical thinking. This course provides strategies and techniques for solving complex problems.
